code: import axios from'axios';var getUserDetails=function getUserDetails(id){return axios.get("/api/users/".concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};var deleteUser=function deleteUser(id){return axios.delete("/api/users/".concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};export{getUserDetails,deleteUser};
